modName: Sapphire talks with you Fix for quest Stabilized
summary:
Obsolete. Fix integrated into Unofficial Skyrim Patch.
Fixes quest Stabilized. No more "I don't have any business with you. So get out of my face."
Now Sapphire will talk with you when you accept quest from Shadr.
She should also resume her normal activities instead of just standing in one place 24/7.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]If you are using [/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url], this fix is not needed. Fix is integrated into [/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url].[/size]

Fixes quest Stabilized. No more "I don't have any business with you. So get out of my face."
Now Sapphire will talk with you when you accept quest from Shadr.
She should also resume her normal activities instead of just standing in one place 24/7.
author: Blakrajder
